trans-unit.source: scale of pdf pages that will be rendered to images, default : 1.5
Page that will be displayed when the book starts, default:1
Defines if the sounds are enabled
Page width in pixels (should be the same size as the page image width, default: 1000
Page height in pixels (should be the same size as the page image height, default: 1414
Thumbnail width in pixels (should be the same size as the thumbnail image width, default: 100
Thumbnail height in pixels (should be the same size as the thumbnail image height, default: 141
If the table of content will be displayed on start, default : false
if the thumbnails will be displayed on start, default : false
If single page layout will be used instead of standard double page layout, default : false
If the single page view will be forced on mobile devices, default : false
if instead of flipbook app browser will open pdf directly in its own default pdf viewer. For this option PDF url must be set. default : false
